testResults: All water quality parameters meet WHO drinking water standards and Zambian Bureau of Standards requirements. Turbidity: <1 NTU, pH: 6.5-8.5, Residual Chlorine: 0.2-0.5 mg/L
Soil bearing capacity adequate for highway construction. CBR values 8-12% for subgrade, 30-40% for sub-base. Compaction tests meet AASHTO standards.
internationalAccreditation: International Society of Soil Mechanics and Geotechnical Engineering
testingLaboratory: Road Development Agency Materials Testing Lab

testResults: Hospital infrastructure design complies with medical equipment requirements. Electrical systems, HVAC, and structural support verified for MRI, CT, and surgical equipment installation.
internationalAccreditation: International Hospital Federation / Siemens Healthineers Certified

testResults: Environmental monitoring confirms compliance with ZEMA regulations. Air quality, noise levels, and water discharge within acceptable limits. Biodiversity offset programs on track.
testingLaboratory: Zambia Environmental Management Agency Approved Labs

specialistType: Aviation Safety and Fire Protection Specialist
testResults: Airport fire safety systems meet ICAO Annex 14 Category 9 requirements. Fire suppression systems, emergency egress, and rescue access verified.

testResults: Preliminary hydrological study completed. Kafue River flow data analysis supports 750MW generation capacity. Further detailed studies required before construction.
